data.text: @yonceHBO @enews This cracker is tired of listening to your Ebonics. Don #Imus was right. Too bad he got the boot. #byeFelicia

@Be88Thereal @thtsohenny And it's too much pressure for her. If she is dating in London now. She is very private about it which is what I think she wanted from drake
@Be88Thereal @thtsohenny I think it's pretty did duly for rih especially nowadays cos everything she dates someone people become too obsessed
@Be88Thereal @thtsohenny I think that's what he wanted from rih and rih was probably not ready to be too public with it. That could also be one of their struggles

@Be88Thereal But too good came way before there was a hype about the relationship. Drake released his album in April. That was way before ...

@Be88Thereal But you know what? Let's agree to disagree
